data.title: African American Owned Public Radio Stations

data.text:
The Complete List of African-American Public Radio Stations

Here is the broad network of radio stations that serve African-American, General Audience, Latino and Native-American, and African audiences. 55 of these 72 station broadcast AAPRC programs every week.Our listeners are socially conscious, intellectually curious, and highly educated achievers. 70% of all African-American Public radio stations (and 70% of all NPR stations) are licensed to universities.
